info.name: Rock, Paper, Shotgun - no ad,head,twitter,comments
info.description:
Now removes the full header, remove #header, from the css if you want it back.

Removes all the social options and it also removes the 'Respond to our gibber' box at the right.

At the bottom of the page it removes the the comments.
info.additionalInfo:
Updated to make visited links a little darker.

Updated on 17 September 2013 to go with their slight redesign.
